code: export var GET_BOOKINGS_LOADING="GET_BOOKINGS_LOADING";export var GET_BOOKINGS_SUCCESS="GET_BOOKINGS_SUCCESS";export var GET_BOOKINGS_ERROR="GET_BOOKINGS_ERROR";export var GET_MOVIES_LOADING="GET_MOVIES_LOADING";export var GET_MOVIES_SUCCESS="GET_MOVIES_SUCCESS";export var GET_MOVIES_ERROR="GET_MOVIES_ERROR";export var GET_LOGIN_ISAUTH="GET_LOGIN_ISAUTH";export var getBookingLoading=function getBookingLoading(){return{type:GET_BOOKINGS_LOADING};};export var getBookingSuccess=function getBookingSuccess(data){return{type:GET_BOOKINGS_SUCCESS,payload:data};};export var getBookingError=function getBookingError(){return{type:GET_BOOKINGS_ERROR};};export var getMoviesLoading=function getMoviesLoading(){return{type:GET_MOVIES_LOADING};};export var getMoviesSuccess=function getMoviesSuccess(data){return{type:GET_MOVIES_SUCCESS,payload:data};};export var getMoviesError=function getMoviesError(){return{type:GET_MOVIES_ERROR};};export var getLoginIsAuth=function getLoginIsAuth(){return{type:GET_LOGIN_ISAUTH};};export var getBookings=function getBookings(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(getBookingLoading());fetch("http://localhost:8080/moviesBooked").then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(res){return dispatch(getBookingSuccess(res));}).catch(function(){return dispatch(getBookingError());});};};export var getMovies=function getMovies(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(getMoviesLoading());fetch("http://localhost:8080/movies").then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(res){return dispatch(getMoviesSuccess(res));}).catch(function(){return dispatch(getMoviesError());});};};export var getMoviesbyID=function getMoviesbyID(id){return function(dispatch){dispatch(getMoviesLoading());fetch("http://localhost:8080/movies/".concat(id)).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(res){return dispatch(getMoviesSuccess(res));}).catch(function(){return dispatch(getMoviesError());});};};
